roleset.name: marital difficulties

example.name: adjectival
example.text: The British satirical magazine Private Eye won an appeal against the size of a $960,000 libel award to Sonia Sutcliffe, the estranged wife of the ``Yorkshire Ripper'' mass murderer.

example.name: ARG2
example.text: More parents reported being estranged from daughters than from sons.

roleset.note: ESTRANGE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'estrange' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from estrange.01-v predicate notes)
